data.text: Dedicated to a day that's as colorful as our people. Here's to wishing you a day full of happiness and fun. #HappyHoli #iflycaribbean https://t.co/Y76YSfbhzA
@eysarahh We were saying the same thing! Good luck! ;)
@kierancan We see it! It's really creative. Thanks for entering :)
@kierancan We sure are! We'd love to see your entry!
@lh796_leza We're disheartened to hear this. You may submit your complaint to bring it to the attention of our Customer Relations team by completing this form here: https://t.co/KSciSRA2uU

@notsoclear Hi Crystal, we're truly disheartened to learn of your experience. We'd like to know how we could make improvements. Would you be willing to complete our Customer Relations form? Here's the link to it: https://t.co/65HzFGlbIN
@curlygirlmimi It's a bit more complex than that, Mimi. Feel free to submit your ideas to our Customer Relations team here: https://t.co/KSciSRA2uU

data.text: @curlygirlmimi Hi Mimi, we truly appreciate your loyalty. An advantage of Club Caribbean is priority baggage handling. That means your bags are first to be loaded unto the plane so it would be last to come out. Thanks for the feedback on how we could improve
@JeanMarc_Nikosi We're sorry but we're not able to commit to a specific date for travel to this destination at this time. Please stay tuned for updates
Wishing our friends and family in Suriname, a peaceful and commemorative Revolution Day. #revolutionday #suriname #iflycaribbean https://t.co/0zo7DIR1vw

@MichaBucknor Hi Meekz, we try our very best to go beyond for our customers and it pains us that you were not satisfied with our service. Would you mind submitting your feedback to our team so they'd know how to improve? You may submit your feedback here: https://t.co/65HzFGlbIN.
@SSKoolG You're most welcome, Suleen.
@SSKoolG Happy Mashramani to you!
May you continue to shine as radiant as ever! Happy Republic Day Guyana! #happymashramani #guyana #iflycaribbean https://t.co/rz2CrDnXj9
@rezziemaven Thanks for booking with us!
@NaasiraMohammed We understand Naasira and we wish you all the best. Looking forward to serving you in June!😊
@NaasiraMohammed And we'd love to see you soon Naasira😁 Thanks for sharing!
May our people live united, strong in soul and strong in arm. Happy Independence Day to the beautiful island of St. Lucia. #happyindependence #stlucia #iflycaribbean https://t.co/9gXLiqxP6e
@Msingh8138 Hi there, please note that you can check-in up to 24 hours before your flight. You may check-in online here: https://t.co/UsgXXwno1P
@OdochiEwuoma You may want to reach out to the Duty Free store at  1 868 669 3000 Ext. 7545/7548 to bring this to their attention
@xoxoPrincess_ Hi, we're really sorry to hear that. Most of our ticket offices should be closed now. We advise you to give us a call in the morning to put your ticket on hold

@xoxoPrincess_ Hi, please note that if your flight reservation is not cancelled prior to the departure time, rebooking is not permitted and the ticket will have no value. If you're unable to make your flight, please give us a call as soon as possible: https://t.co/lDDA7OmmFg

@MissYim2 Hi, we're sorry to learn your experience with us was less than adequate and would like to look into this for you. May we ask that you kindly fill out our Customer Relations form to make an official complaint on these issues? Here is the link:  https://t.co/65HzFGlbIN
@alvernp Hi we're sorry to hear this. Would you mind submitting your feedback to our team so they'd know how to improve? This can be submitted here: https://t.co/65HzFGlbIN

"If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader” - John Quincy Adams. Happy Presidents Day to our friends and family in the US. #iflycaribbean https://t.co/bTwWarUZjP

data.text: #ThingsToDoInCuba Drive around in a car and look like a rockstar! The only cars legally owned in Cuba are cars created before 1959. #caribbean2cuba #iflycaribbean https://t.co/NJLlWq0mZZ
@khadine868 Hi Khadine, please give us a call on 625-7200 so we can assist with this

@khadine868 Hi Khadine, if you're an in-transit passenger, you won't need to collect your bags. However, if these flights are on two different tickets, you'd need to go through all the relevant security and customs checkpoints.
@trinihotfootTT love it! Thanks for sharing with us!

data.text: @AuthorLady  Even if checking in online, you should arrive at the airport 3 hours prior to your flight departure time to allow sufficient time for necessary baggage and security checks. If you have luggage to check in, please be at the airport before the check-in counter closes.
@soulfulll_k It truly is, Keisha!
@AuthorLady Hi Anushka, we're not understanding your query. Could you please clarify so that we may assist?

Today's the last day to take advantage of our Valentine's Day Sale. Take 14% OFF all flights for you & that special someone. Sale ends at 11:59PM https://t.co/kXA0qUELai period is 14 February to 14 March, 2018 only. Don't miss out, BOOK NOW! https://t.co/0OFTC11mzp #iflycaribbean https://t.co/S4mnLhTYmT
@itsawrap82 Glad to hear Esem! We hope to serve you again soon!
You can choose your seat when you complete your web check-in. How often do you web check-in when you travel with us? #webcheckin #seatassignment #iflycaribbean
@boodoosinghny Hi there, how can we assist you?
@TriniAngie Have you booked your ticket already, Angie? Hoping to get others to go with you?
